name: Feed the King or Die Trying
name_original: Feed the King or Die Trying
description:
The King's chicken coop has been invaded by poachers. As a chef you need to be able to keep your King alive, and prevent these nuisances from getting to his pile of food.

Controls:

* Drag the ball to charge him like a catapult, and then launch him by releasing.
* Once landed, tap to do a short dash attack, which will target enemies in a short range in front of him.
* If the dash misses enemies, he will have a time of exhaustion
* If enemies manage to get close to you, they will latch on for a free ride to the kings food pile.
